# makeBody(configuration:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a view that represents the body of a button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func makeBody(configuration: CardButtonStyle.Configuration) -> some View

```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The properties of the button.

## Discussion

The system calls this method for each [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Button] instance in a view hierarchy in which [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/CardButtonStyle] is the current button style.
